name: International Academic Conference on Teaching and Education
content: International Academic Conference on Teaching and Education (ICTEDUCATION) Calling all educators, researchers, and passionate advocates for education! The International Academic Conference on Teaching and Education, taking place October 4th-6th, 2024, in Brussels, Belgium, is your chance to ignite your professional journey. This prestigious conference offers a unique platform to showcase your groundbreaking research and insights. Present your work to a global audience of educators and scholars, fostering vibrant discussions and sparking new ideas that can transform the future of learning. Network with colleagues from across the globe, forging lasting collaborations that will propel your work forward. The ICTEDUCATION conference isn't just about academics â€“ it's about professional development too. Gain valuable recognition by presenting your research at this esteemed international event, a surefire way to enhance your CV and establish yourself as a leader in the field. Publication opportunities: Get your research published in the Conference Proceedings with ISSN and DOI or in Scopus-indexed journals. In-person attendees will have the exclusive opportunity to explore the vibrant city of Brussels through a complimentary guided tour. Immerse yourself in the city's rich history and culture, making this conference an unforgettable experience. Whether you choose to join us in person or virtually, ICTEDUCATION offers flexible options to suit your needs and preferences. Don't miss this enriching academic experience! Register today and become part of the International Academic Conference on Teaching and Education!
